=Tested Hardware=
This page lists the platforms on which v4l4j is known to compile, and the various video devices which work with v4l4j.

*Please, help me expand this list. If you have a successful (or unsuccessful) experience with a specific video device / platform not listed on this page, please take a few minutes to post a comment on the [http://groups.google.com/group/v4l4j v4l4j mailing list].*

==Tested Platforms==
libv4l has been compiled for and tested successfully on the following platforms:
 * Ubuntu 7.10 - x86 
 * Ubuntu 8.04 - x86 & x86_64
 * Ubuntu 8.10 - x86 & x86_64
 * Ubuntu 9.04 - x86 & x86_64
 * Ubuntu 9.10 - x86 & x86_64
 * Ubuntu 10.04 - x86 & x86_64
 * Ubuntu 10.10 - x86 & x86_64
 * Debian Etch - x86
 * Debian Lenny - Neo FreeRunner
 * Gentoo 2008.0 - x86_64
 * openSUSE 10.3 - x86
 * Fedora release 10 (Cambridge) - x86 
 * Maemo 5 - Nokia N900
